title: First Person Movement Controller - Advanced
shortDescription: Overfort's First Person Movement Controller - Advanced is a flexible  tool that allows you to create a vast range of unique first-person games without any coding skills required⭐Now with HDRP and URP Support!Try the online demo now!First Person Movement Controller - Advanced includes scripts to enhance the built-in CharacterController by adding features with a simple click.Features can be enabled with a simple checkbox from the main script and the relevant variables have been exposed in the editor to make it accessible even to non-programmers.This allows for enormous flexibility and creates the possibility of generating hundreds of different variations of movement styles.Features:✅ Basic walk movement✅ Run and sprint✅ Parkour and Climbing✅ Crouch and prone movement✅ Sliding✅ Left and right leaning✅ Grappling hook (Include hook 3D model)✅ Wall run✅ Headbob✅ High-quality sounds✅ 5 movement presets✅ Unity's new Input System supportDo not include:❌ Character❌ Character animations❌ First person hands❌ Shooting or melee combat❌ Health and damage systemBEFORE IMPORTING THE PACKAGE, MAKE SURE TO BACK UP THE PROJECT AND YOUR INPUT MANAGER FOR SAFETY.BE AWARE THAT THE INPUT MANAGER WILL BE OVERRIDDEN
